title: memeyrich
author: memeyrich
created_time: May 23, 2023, 05:41:44 PMLast edit: May 25, 2023, 10:24:06 PM by memeyrich
content: Immigrant Bob's big ✯ BOUNTY CAMPAIGN ✯ www.immigrantbob.comImmigrant Bob is in the process of building the biggest meme community ever. We'll take over the space. Come, be part of the next big thing. Immigrant Bob will be as big as we make it, together.Bounty rules: - Whichever bounty you choose to hunt, save screenshots and links for proofs - Submit the proofs to collect@immigrantbob.com ONCE a week - All posts/comments must be visible to the community you posted in - Low effort comments/posts will not be rewarded - Spam-looking posts will not be rewardedBounty duration: 2 months.Rewards are paid out in $IMBOB.Reward distribution: by 07/30/2023.✯ TWITTER BOUNTY1. Supporter's bounty;Follow + Like + Retweet + Comment on posts = 20$ per post (max 2 per day)So, Immigrant Bob makes a tweet/post -> you like it -> retweet -> comment -> screenshot -> save for when you're ready to submit  2. Raider's Bounty;Raid other meme coin project's posts = 50$ per RAIDThe goal is to take-over their post and direct their followers to Immigrant BobProcess:Go to another meme coin project's new twitter post -> comment about Immigrant Bob -> introduce their followers to Immigrant Bob and why he's better -> screenshot✯ REDDIT BOUNTY 1. MEMEr's bounty;Post Immigrant Bob meme to crypto-related communities on Reddit = 25$ per post (max 10 posts per week)Note: the post must be visible in the community. 2. Raider's bounty;Raid crypto posts about other meme coins/projects. The goal is to introduce people and direct attention from other projects to Immigrant Bob = 50$ per raid.✯ INSTAGRAM BOUNTY  1. MEMEr's bounty;Post Immigrant Bob meme on Instagram and use crypto-and-enterpreneur-related tags to maximize the reach. = 30$ per post (max 10 posts per week)Note: The profile you use MUST be public and active, and must have followers. 2. Raider's bounty;Raid crypto-and-investment-related Instagram posts and introduce people to Immigrant Bob by comments and direct replies.The goal is to introduce Instagram users and direct attention from other projects to Immigrant Bob = 50$ per raid.Raid only posts not older than 2 days.Screenshot every raid you complete, every meme you post and copy the links, then submit it to collect@immigrantbob.com once a week.TO ENTER BOUNTY:Post proof of entrance below: - your twitter username - your reddit username - your bep20 addressHappy bounty hunting, immigrants!Don't forget to join Immigrant Bob on Twitter + Telegram
